dialogue: Our bonuses will depend on the results of the employee attitude survey.
If we boost our morale rank, we'll get bigger bonuses.
Get it? All you have to do is say you're happy and you get money.
No-o-o-o! Heaven forbid. Absolutely no lying.
But if you did lie, imagine the things you could buy with that money.
I'll hand out the surveys and you can let your conscience guide you.
I'm going to lie me up a new couch!
